name: Pirate Solitaire
description:
Outwit the old sea dog and seize the pirates' gold!

Play solitaire right on the deck of the reavers' ship.
Levels of varying difficulty promise several hours of exciting gameplay, and unique golden cards make the game even more interesting.

1 player(s)
Network Features
10000KB Minimum
Touchscreen

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.
